Body: Description: I have generated a new cert, and uploaded it and the corresponding key to the server. However, the certificate is installed without the accompying root certificate and issueing certificate authorities that were part of the certificate chain that I pasted into the server admin web page, which results in an untrusted certificate error being presented when accessing the site. Is there a separate place to upload certificate authorities? how do I get the entire certificate, including the CAs, imported into the server?
Next Steps Updated: As they were facing issues importing the certificate, I scheduled a remote session in order to assist them.
What We've Learned Updated: The customer would like to replace the TLS Certificate
Invitation updated. Attendees: No attendees listed
Invitation updated. Attendees: Emil Podar, Jeff Schemp
